net.asrex.skillful.ui

Class SpriteSheetPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.ui.TexturePosition
      • net.asrex.skillful.ui.SpriteSheetPosition

  • public class SpriteSheetPosition
extends TexturePosition
    A TexturePosition that represents a tile on a sprite sheet. By default, it will use Skillful's built-in 16x16 sprite sheet, but alternative textures may be provided as well.
